events.name: Rails Girls Meetup (DevFest.Asia, and the last Rails Girls for 2015)
events.description: This is a event is part of DevFest.Asia, Southeast Asia's first community organized web developer festival. Please RSVP here to guarantee your place.  This will be the last Rails Girls session for 2015, and it's happening as part of the 1.5 weeks long DevFest.Asia. Come along and learn some Ruby on Rails from the Ruby Singapore group! We love beginners so do join us if you are curious about web development and would like to find out more about Ruby and Ruby on Rails. As usual, we have a structured workshop session to guide you all along. For those who have been attending our meetups regularly and/or know the basics of Ruby on Rails, our flexibility will still be there.  If you'd like to work on your project or run through concepts with guidance, our coaches are more than happy to help and answer your questions.  We love the enthusiasts! Come and join us at the November Rails Girls meetup! Agenda: • 10:00 - 10:15 Registration • 10:15 - 10:20 Introduction • 10:20 - 10:30 Break into Groups • 10:30 - 13:00 Start to Code  ---------- FAQs ---------- I haven't attended any previous Rails Girls events. Can I still join in this one? Absolutely! We'll guide you through the basics, so don't worry! What should I bring? A working laptop and power supply. Is this free? Yes! But we are not providing any food/coffee. Can I come if I'm not a woman? Rails Girls is designed for women and anyone who self-identifies as a woman. Men are most welcomed as a participant's +1 . Is there an age limit? Nope! Event is full! What should I do? Join the waitlist! We'll let you know when a new slot becomes available.  Also, please update your RVSP if your plans have changed. Someone will really appreciate your slot. :) I'm a professional Rails Developer, can I be a coach? Yes, we are always looking for Ruby/Rails experts to help! Please contact Nathania (nathaniawong89@gmail.com) and DO NOT RSVP to this event. Confirmed coaches: - Winston - Ted - Lachlan - Lincoln - Ernest - Renato - Sai - Aravindh Can my company sponsor Rails Girls meetup? Thank you for helping us build an awesome community!  If your company would like to sponsor this meetup, please get in touch with Winston (winston.yongwei@gmail.com).
